Window

Interface IStorage.IBoardModeItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Storage.BoardModeItem
    Enclosing interface:
    IStorage

    public static interface IStorage.IBoardModeItem
    This sub-interface of IStorage contains method specifications of settings of a board mode option. It extends the IItem general purpose interface.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IStorage.IBoardModeItem.IPlayerRow
      This sub-interface of IStorage contains method specifications of player data representation.

      • isAIPlayerAdded

        boolean isAIPlayerAdded()
        Answers whether is any AI player added.
        Returns:
        True if at least one AI player is added otherwise false.

      • addPlayer

        void addPlayer(byte playerIndex,
               String color,
               boolean isAuto)
        throws TError
        Adds a player to the board mode option
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - Unique index of the player whether it be AI or human one
        color - The color code of player in html style like #cc0000
        isAuto - If true than AI player is generated otherwise a non-AI paler.
        Throws:
        TError - Thrown if an unrecoverable error was occurred.
